description: Non material amendment to planning permission ref. 2018/4011, dated 16/07/2019. The proposed amendment relates to the trigger for the approval of details required by conditions 4 (Approval of external materials), 5 (Detailed drawings - windows and doors) and 7 (Detailed drawings - fencing, walling and boundary treatments).
